      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Bougie brûlante dans une une installation comprenant une bouteille d'eau</string>
            <string language="en">Burning candle in a bottle of water setup</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennende Kerze in einer Flasche der 
Wasserinstallation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vela ardente em um frasco da instalação da 
água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Candela burning in una bottiglia della messa a 
punto dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καίγοντας κερί σε ένα μπουκάλι της οργάνωσης ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vela ardiente en una botella de la disposición 
del agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre l'installation permet de donner l'illusion qu'une bougie brûle à l'intérieur d'une  bouteille d'eau en utilisant un verre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the setup on how to make a candle appear to be burning inside a bottle of water using a glass.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bougie brûlante</string>
            <string language="en">burning candle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">verre</string>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">tour de magie</string>
            <string language="en">magic trick</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroirs</string>
            <string language="en">mirrors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bouteille d'eau</string>
            <string language="en">water bottle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Installation auf, wie 
man eine Kerze scheinen läßt, innerhalb einer Flasche Wassers mit 
einem Glas zu brennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a instalação em como 
fazer uma vela parecer queimar-se dentro de um frasco da água usando 
um vidro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la messa a punto su 
come fare una candela sembrare bruciarsi all'interno di una bottiglia 
di acqua usando un vetro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την οργάνωση στο πώς να 
κάνει ένα κερί να εμφανιστεί μέσα σε ένα μπουκάλι του ύδατος 
χρησιμοποιώντας ένα γυαλί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la disposición en 
cómo hacer que una vela aparece quemarse dentro de una botella de 
agua usando un cristal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">brennende Kerze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glas</string>
          </keyword>
